response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer.

For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this remarkable product at a price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its full value of $1,200,000, providing you with an excellent return on investment.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations, and I am eager to facilitate this transaction for you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
